attributes.action: instruct the Police force of the United Kingdom to investigate the illegal transfer of power from the crown to a foriegn power/state (ie, Brussels) as no mandate or powers have ever been granted by the people of the United Kingdon or the Queen.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As loyal subjects of Her Majesty Queen Elisabethh 2nd we the people have never given aurthority to any person ,organisation or political party to tranfers powers of the state of the UK to any foriegn boddy. Any such act being treason against the state and all carrying out such act be held to account. All members of the House of parliment on taking up their seat on behalf of the people of the UK, Swore an oath of alegiance to the queen and state to serve them and the people of the UK first above themselves or any foriegn power.All such transfers being illegal and there fore not inforcable under British law.

rejection.details: The PM can not instruct the police to investigate something. If you have concerns we suggest you raise them with the police directly.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
